name: TAG: Tower Attack Game
description:
TAG: Tower Attack Game

TAG is a flip on the Tower Defense genre where the player is the one ATTACKING towers! Plan your paths well and choose your upgrades wisely, TAG gets increasingly difficult with every new round.  Every run of TAG is unique: you will face new challenges and make new builds every time you play! 

Core Features

  • Unique Tower Attack Gameplay in the Tower Offence genre
  • Retro-futuristic Neon Genesis Evangelion-inspired aesthetics
  • Endless Roguelike gameplay with high-replay value
  • Numerous viable strategies to experiment with
Your path. Your strategy.

Place your paths anywhere, the screen is the limit!

Execute your plans.

Deploy your strategy, put your plan to the test!

Upgrade your convoy.

Choose your playstyle, adapt your tactics!
